# Import libraries
```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(magrittr)
```

# Import data
```{r}
library(readr)
djia.df <- read_csv("D:/Code/R/Kaggle/stocknews/Data/Combined_News_DJIA.csv", 
    col_types = cols(Label = col_factor(levels = c("0", 
        "1"))))
summary(djia.df)
```
The dataset has `r nrow(djia.df)` rows and `r ncol(djia.df)` columns.

# Data Exploration
View a selection of the Top 1 news:
```{r}
 djia.df %>%
  dplyr::select(Top1) %>%
  dplyr::sample_n(20) %>%
  purrr::map(print)
```
